not-found.title: page not found
not-found.text: sorry, the page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. please go back to the homepage or contact us if the problem persists

cookies.cookies title: we use cookies to enhance the functionality of the website.you can disable cookies in your browser settings.
cookies.content text 1: A cookie is a small text file that is stored in a dedicated location on your computer, tablet, smartphone or other device when you use your browser to visit an online service. A cookie allows its sender to identify the device on which it is stored during the period of validity of consent, which does not exceed 13 months.
cookies.content text 2: These cookies are required for optimum operation of the website, and cannot be configured. They allow us to offer you the key functions of the website (language used, display resolution, account access, shopping bag, wish list, etc.), provide you with online advice and secure our website against any attempted fraud.
cookies.content text 3: These cookies are used to measure and analyse our website audience (visitor volume, pages viewed, average browsing time, etc.) to help us improve its performance.By accepting these cookies, you are helping us to improve our website.
cookies.content text 4: These cookies are used for Off White advertisements displayed on third-party websites, including social media, and are tailored to your preferences and to help us measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns. If you deactivate these cookies,advertising (including ours) will continue to be displayed as you browse the Internet, although they will not be specific to your personal interests, and will therefore be less relevant.
cookies.content text 5: These cookies allow us to provide you with online or in-store recommendations of products, services and content that match your expectations and preferences. By accepting these cookies, you are opting for an enriched and personalised experience.
cookies.cookies to personalize the grbpwr experi: cookies to personalize the grbpwr experience

care.DCASE: Dry Clean with Any Solvent Except Trichloroethylene
care.DCPS: Dry Clean with Petroleum Solvent Only

measurements-descriptions.chest: Measured chest flat across garment, from under-arm to under-arm
measurements-descriptions.shoulders: Measured horizontally across garment, from shoulder-seam to shoulder-seam
measurements-descriptions.bottom-width: Measured bottom width flat across garment
measurements-descriptions.length: Measured from center-back neck down to bottom of garment
measurements-descriptions.inseam: Measured from crotch down to bottom along inseam (inside leg)
measurements-descriptions.sleeve: Measured from center back neck, including shoulder to bottom of hem

meta.description: latest ready-to-wear menswear, womenswear, and accessories

order-status.text: you will find your order number in your order confirmation email. if you recently made a purchase, be aware that it could take a few minutes to process your order and receive the confirmation email. if you do not find you confirmation email, please check your spam folder.

firstName.min: first name must contain at least 1 character
firstName.max: first name must contain at most 40 characters
firstName.regex: must contain at least one letter and only letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods are allowed

lastName.min: last name must contain at least 1 character
lastName.max: last name must contain at most 40 characters
lastName.regex: must contain at least one letter and only letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods are allowed

phone.min: phone must contain at least 5 numbers
phone.max: phone must contain at most 15 numbers

city.min: city must contain at least 2 characters
city.regex: must contain at least one letter and only letters, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods are allowed

address.min: address must contain at least 3 characters
address.max: address must contain at most 40 characters
address.regex: only letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods are allowed

postalCode.min: postal code must contain at least 2 characters
postalCode.max: postal code must contain at most 12 characters
postalCode.regex: postal code must contain only letters, numbers, spaces, or hyphens

country.min: country must contain at least 2 characters

company.min: company must contain at least 1 character
company.max: company must contain at most 40 characters
company.regex: only letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods are allowed

email.max: email must contain at most 40 characters

additionalAddress.min: additional address must contain at least 3 characters
additionalAddress.max: additional address must contain at most 40 characters
additionalAddress.regex: only letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, apostrophes, and periods are allowed

termsOfService.required: you must accept the terms and conditions to proceed

refund.text: you will find your return number in your return confirmation email. If you have recently requested a return, please note that it may take a few minutes to process your request and send the confirmation email. if you do not see the confirmation email, please check your spam folder.

unsubscribe.title: unsubscribing from list "grbpwr". by clicking unsubscribe, you’ll no longer receive marketing emails.

unsubscribe.error: an error occurred. please try again.
